> Package boost-1.53.0

That version of Boost is too old to build the 0.21 branch, Boost 1.58.0 [or later is required](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/0.21/doc/dependencies.md). I'd suggest [using depends](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/tree/0.21/depends) if you'd like to compile Bitcoin Core on a system where it only packages very old versions of our dependencies.
@brad0 Did you try reporting this upstream? Reading the release notes, it appears they didn't intend to include braking changes in boost::fs 1.77 yet, unless I am missing something.
